item.title: BlockSpin Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use the following Roblox BlockSpin monthly redeem codes for October 2025 to get your hands on the best firearms, lots of free cash, and plenty of cases.

Thriving as a gangster or good citizen in BlockSpin is a survival test for the fittest. You must level up your avatar to become the strongest on the map. Skills such as Stamina, Self Stocker, Janitor, Fishing, Farming, Cook, and Swiper determine your gameplay efficiency. However, for a smooth progress, you’ll need the finest weapons and vehicles. This is when you should redeem the active BlockSpin codes.

These Roblox promo codes are easy to use and will grant you thousands of Cash, in-game currency, without the heavy-duty grinding. You can also redeem free Cases via these codes and add the best firearms to your inventory. 

Active BlockSpin Codes 

Inactive BlockSpin Codes

  • BJZ9C1
  • C5026Q
  • I70IIH
  • 19OC9L
  • H268YH
  • 4B5D16
  • 3XQ47A
  • 5POI5N
  • 9ER2Q6

  • 38X143
  • OI1ZAD
  • 4B008X
  • 6F1776
  • KHU619

How To Redeem BlockSpin Codes

Follow the steps listed below to redeem all the active codes in BlockSpin:

  1. Launch BlockSpin and land on the map. 
  2. Press the black icon on the right side of the screen. 
  3. Select “Codes” to open the code box. 
  4. Enter the code in the “Enter Game Code” text box. 
  5. Activate the code by clicking the “Redeem” button. 

More About BlockSpin Codes

Purchase the Ammo and Weapon Cases using the free Cash obtained from the active codes. Players are advised to open the Superior and Elite Weapon Cases. The following are the odds of all the weapons from the Superior Case and Elite Case in BlockSpin:

  • Pistol – $720

FAQs On BlockSpin Codes

What are the latest active codes?

“BLOCKSPIN_GRIPS_UPDATE” and “UNDER_THE_BARREL” are the latest codes in BlockSpin, both of which were released through the game’s official Discord server. 

Does any code offer free vehicles?

As of now, none of the active codes for BlockSpin can be redeemed for free vehicles. 

What codes offer the maximum amount of Cases?

“UNDER_THE_BARREL” is the only BlockSpin code that offers 10 Cases upon redemption.

While you’re getting involved in Roblox, check out our code guides for other games, such as Basketball Zero, Anime Last Stand, and Lost Currents.
